feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
